en: Docker is unavailable: it is either not installed, or your user account or application lacks the necessary permissions to interact with the Docker socket. Please ensure that Docker is running and try again.
Choose where to store AccessMod data

This tool will load an archived project (\*.am5p ) into the database. It should be faster and more reliable than the classic uploader, especially for large projects.
The name should have at least 4 alphanumeric characters and start with a letter. No special characters allowed except underscore.
